list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long limbless reptile which has no eyelids, a short tail, and jaws that are capable of considerable extension. Some snakes have a venomous bite.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: that man is a cold-blooded snake
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đàn ông đó là một con rắn máu lạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a former system of interconnected exchange rates for the currencies of EC countries.
a long flexible wire for clearing obstacles in piping.
move or extend with the twisting motion of a snake.
